name: PositiveLiving
0:
”Alexa, open Positive Living”
”Tip of the day”
”What is extra sensory perception?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: positive living
des:
Positive Living presents motivational daily tips to help boost your productivity and to help you get out of that slump presented by AYRIAL’s vetted lifestyle consultants, who are among the world's leading experts in the areas of; feng shui, intuitive consulting, health & wellness practitioners, dream experts and more! 

To enable, say, “Alexa, open Positive Living.”— and prepare to be enlightened!

Once you enable “Positive Living”, Alexa will present you with three options: Hear Daily Tips - Ask a Question - Voice Search to find a lifestyle consultant. 

- Listen to audio recorded Daily Tips presented by exceptional lifestyle consultants who are also leaders in their field of expertise. Listen to as many tips as you’d like throughout the day. As a surprise bonus, we’ve included audio excerpts with parapsychologist Jeffrey Mishlove and best selling author Gary Zukav from the PBS featured documentary, “The Intuitive Factor, Genius or Chance?”

Ask a Question, topics cover:

- Feng Shui 
- Metaphysical Topics
- Love & Relationships
- Dream Interpretation
- Female Empowerment

Here are sample questions you can ask Alexa:

- Can I use feng shui for marketing?
- Why is clutter bad?
- Can feng shui improve my health?
- Who was the Oracle at Delphi
- What is extra sensory perception?
- What is a spiritual medium?
- How can I become an empowered woman?
- Why do I have nightmares?
- Does everyone dream?


The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number".

If there's a question that you would like to be answered and included, e-mail us at support@AYRIAL.com.

Voice Search 

You can ask “Positive Living” to find you a lifestyle consultant by area of expertise, by name, by city or state. 

Sample questions to ask Alexa:

- Can you recommend a feng shui expert in Texas?
- Is there a spiritual medium in Boston?
- I’m looking for an intuitive consultant
- Can you find me a dream practitioner?
- Is there a feng shui consultant in Fort Lauderdale?
- Is there someone who does automatic handwriting?
- Who is Victoria lynn Weston?
- Who is April Kirkwood?
- Who is Rose Hart?

AYRIAL Positive Living features vetted lifestyle consultants including:

+ Victoria lynn Weston, Business Intuitive Consultant
+ Marc Lainhart, the Intuitive Prospector
+ Viviana Estrada, Bazi Astrologer & Certified Feng Shui Practitioner
+ David Low, Ph.D., MS, DreamWork Practitioner
+ Lauren Robbins, Spiritual Medium


For a complete list of AYRIAL “Positive Living” vetted lifestyle consultants, visit: AYRIAL.com/List 

AYRIAL has additional Alexa Skills:

- AYRIAL/fengshui: say, “Alexa, open feng shui!” to get tips presented by certified feng shui experts. 

- ARE YOU PSYCHIC? say, “Alexa, open are you psychic” and test your ESP using Zener Cards! 


WHO WE ARE:

AYRIAL is a new kind of body, mind and spirit association that features exceptional and vetted feng shui practitioners, astrologers, authentic spiritual mediums, dreamwork practitioners, meditation teachers and life coaches. In addition to our online presence, we make it easy for users to connect with a lifestyle consultant and to showcase exclusive content utilizing innovative, hands-free technology! 

To learn more visit: AYRIAL.com
AYRIAL Podcast: AYRIAL.com/ayrial-talk-radio

SUPPORT:

Email us anytime if you have questions, comments, or feedback at support@AYRIAL.com
